name: The Jekoos
description: Have you ever drawn little comics when you were bored in High School? Have you ever wondered what it would look like if they took life? Well, that's basicaly The Jekoos in a nutshell.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Xp / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 1321 MB available space Additional Notes: *It can work on almost any pc*
